name: sqlc
description: Compile SQL to type-safe code; catch failures before they happen.

get_sale.notes: Needed to pull each record type separately

create_sale.notes: Unable to insert sale with sub-records, and needed to iterate over the sub-records to insert them after setting the parent sale id

customer_update.notes: Needed to use multiple queries or a query that updates all the fields to update customers

customer_sales.notes: Able to use foreign key relationships for joins, also maps to arbitrary structs

daily_reports.notes: Able to group and specify columns easily, would like to see a way to alias a function to a name

sales_reports.notes: Able to specify arbitrary joins, would like to see a way to alias a function to a name

sale_search.notes: Able to specify individual filters as needed

bulk_customers.notes: Unable to use Load Data Infile, but able to use regular insert with many rows

json.notes: No auto-marshalling/unmarshalling of JSON columns or json query helpers, json columns are recognized as json types
